Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ActRelationshipObjective

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a _ActRelationsipObjective

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActRelationsipObjectiveAct Relationsip ObjectiveThe target act is a desired outcome of the source act. Source is any act (typically an intervention). Target must be an observation in criterion mood.

name: ActRelationshipObjective
title: ActRelationshipObjective
description: The target act is a desired outcome of the source act. Source is any act (typically an intervention). Target must be an observation in criterion mood.
